description:
If the Penguindrum is something of Ringo`s, then the most likely place to find it will be in her room, so Kamba and Shoma take the day off school and sneak into Ringo`s room... however they are unable to find the Penguindrum anywhere.
But while they are still looking around, they hear the front door opening - it seems Ringo is home earlier than they expected!

titles.title: Soshite Karei ni Watashi o Tabete...
そして華麗に私を食べて...
